patterns: How we can apply for makeup exam?
what can I do if I miss my mid term exam?
responses: Collect makeup forms from examination section in academic block. Get it signed from designated faculty. Complete this process within 15 days after completion of mid semester exams.
Coding club, Robotics, Literature, Fine Arts, E-cell
mis -> Hostel -> Leave Application
You can find printout/xerox stores in shopping complex, beside science block, near SAC building

patterns: What is served as breakfast on monday morning
response: Methi paratha / Onion paratha(Alternate), Sabji(Aloo white matar), Milk(100ml)

patterns: What is served as breakfast on tuesday morning
response: Bread, Butter and Jam(Both according to preference), Boiled egg (Non-veg) / Paneer pakora(veg), Banana

patterns: What is served as breakfast on wednesday morning
response: Dal puri, Aloo white matar sabji / Aloo chana sabzi [alternate week], (seasonal fruit 3 times in a month)

patterns: What is served as breakfast on thursday morning
response: Sandwich, Egg bhurji (non-veg) / Paneer bhurji (veg), banana

patterns: What is served as breakfast on friday morning
response: Uttapam, Sambar, Banana, coconut(fresh) / peanut chutney[alternate week]

patterns: What is served as breakfast on Saturday morning
response: Dosa, Sambar, coconut[fresh]/ peanut chutney[alternate week]

patterns: What is served as breakfast on sunday morning
response: Aloo Paratha, Badam chutney + chana dal(winter seasonal chutney)(Dhana, tomato, chilli) / Chole Bhature[alternate week]

patterns: What is served as lunch on sunday afternoon
response: Veg Pulao(with ghee), French fries, Malai Kofta, Roti, papad

patterns: What is served as lunch on saturday afternoon
response: Plain Rice, Roti, Papad, Masoor dal, rajma, seasonal fry
